title: 18th October 1922: The British Broadcasting Company established
itunes:summary: The new broadcasting company was a consortium of the UK’s leading radio manufacturers, and was jointly funded through a royalty on the sale of radio sets sold by the member producers and a license ...
dc:creator: History Pod
